title: G7 summit: Dominic Raab says EU's attitude to Northern Ireland 'offensive'
content:
1. G7 summit: Dominic Raab says EU's attitude to Northern Ireland 'offensive'  BBC News
  2. PM wants 'pragmatism and compromise' over NI protocol  Channel 4 News
  3. ‘Mistrusted’ Johnson feels full force of EU fury as Brexit wrecks G7 summit  The Guardian
  4. Queen Elizabeth will need to call upon her charm for Biden's visit | TheHill  The Hill
  5. Johnson wants to be Biden’s buddy. But thanks to Brexit he can never be a true ally  The Guardian
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: G7サミットの様子 ドミニク・ラーブ氏、北アイルランドに対するEUの態度は「攻撃的」と発言
七国集团首脑会议。多米尼克-拉布称欧盟对北爱尔兰的态度 "令人反感"。
七國集團首腦會議。多米尼克-拉布稱歐盟對北愛爾蘭的態度 "令人反感"。
